products.name: Cream Cord Lace Jacket
products.brandedName: Self-Portrait Cream Cord Lace Jacket
products.description: Self-Portrait was established in 2013 by Han Chong. Designed in London but made for the world, the brand makes clothing with a refined aesthetic and an understanding of structure and materials. The brand believes in femininity ensured by elegant functionality, while celebrating and empowering the women in the clothes. Bringing a retro-romantic feel, the Cream Cord Lace Jacket is an effortless shortcut to a polished outfit. Featuring jeweled buttons and lace trim, its relaxed fit allows it to be dressed up or down. Pair with denim and flats or the Cream Cord Lace Midi Skirt for a sophisticated matching set! Round neckline Long sleeves Front snap button closure Double-breasted pockets with button closure Lace trim Lined Material: 77% Polyamide, 23% Viscose (main 1), 51% Viscose, 45% Polyamide, 4% Polyester (main 2), 100% Polyester (lining) Care: Dry clean

BB60MSB1ZB769. About the designer: Hubert de Givenchy founded his namesake fashion house specializing in Haute Couture and ready-to-wear in 1952. No sooner did it open than Givenchy earned a reputation for breaking with the fashion codes of its time. Today, the house is synonymous with aristocratic elegance, sensuality and fresh romanticism. Its legacy continues through the modern approach of its newest Creative Director Matthew M. Williams, appointed in June 2020.

products.description: navy blue white stretch-design seersucker texture horizontal stripe pattern strapless sweetheart neck Be mindful to try on swimwear over your own garments. We've partnered with Good On You — an independent agency that rates how brands perform in relation to their impact on the planet, people and animals, with a multi-criteria rating simplified to a five points scale. In order to be awarded our conscious label, larger brands need to score a minimum of four out of five ('Good'), while smaller brands must score at least three out of five ('It's a start'). This item comes from a brand rated four out of five ('Good') by Good on You at the time it was added on FARFETCH. Please note, this is a brand-level rating and does not guarantee that this product is made with conscious materials. Learn more about what makes a product Conscious on our Conscious Criteria page

products.name: Awash Mystery Cotton Mini Dress
products.brandedName: Johanna Ortiz Awash Mystery Cotton Mini Dress
products.description: For Resort ‘24, the Colombian reimagines her barefoot glamor against the backdrop of New York City to pay homage to her urbanite clientele. The result is a thoughtful assortment of simple and transitional silhouettes that showcase luxe fabrications and color palettes.A perfect beach companion, the 'Awash Mystery' mini has an apron-style silhouette made from light-as-air cotton voile that ties at the back.

products.name: Tinsel Tweed Midi Dress
products.brandedName: Self-Portrait Tinsel Tweed Midi Dress
products.description: Known as the go-to for guest-of wedding dresses, Han Chong’s strength at Self-Portrait has always been understanding how women want to feel when they go out.This baby-doll midi dress is crafted from tweed detailed with metallic tinsel that shines ever-so subtly on top, extending from its bow-detailed waist into a calf-grazing skirt. Pair yours with metallic pumps for a cocktail occasion.

products.name: Block Crepe Maxi Dress

products.description: Founded by Swedish husband-and-wife team William Lundgren and Veronika Kant, BITE (or ‘By Independent Thinkers for Environmental Progress’) Studios marries uncompromising quality with organic, low-impact textiles.Made from responsibly sourced stretch-crepe, the 'Block' dress has a shirting-inspired cut with a collared neckline.
